author: arancibiapablo
title: Northeast Argentinian Community
description: A falta de uma comunidade Cardano na região nordeste da Argentina.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal tries to address the lack of ADA community in the Northeast region of Argentina. The proposer wants to resolve it by building a community and helping to promote blockchain technology with Cardano in Argentina's Northeast region. This proposal clearly addresses the problem.
f6_assessments.q1:
The team seems to have the necessary experience and expertise in the required skills to successfully implement the proposal.
The proposal consists of a lucid roadmap and is further divided into four stages each having its own goals and timeline. The fund requested seems reasonable. Provided all the above information, The possibility of the proposal being implemented successfully is high.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal comes up with all the required information such as KPIs, Success metrics, and complete detailed fund allocation these should be sufficient to audit the success and progress of the proposal. The roadmap provided also helps to track the progress of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal addresses the challenge, although it can also have a good fit with the challenge "Grow Cardano, Grow Latam".
f6_assessments.q1: The team has provided evidence of their ability to conduct the solution. The problem is that there's an inconsistency between what is being promised and the support being requested. There's a large list of training and communication actions, but in the end, the proposal is asking for support to execute a conference.
f6_assessments.q2: The proposal is not really clear, as one cant interpret that they will set up a community, but can interpret also that they will offer trainings (but the audience size is not clear). And can be also conferences. So it's not easy to audit and clear to understand the actual products.

f6_assessments.q0: This project is a great idea, you have identified your problem with the lack of a community in northeastern Argentina. I quote about the goal of this proposal:'' The purpose of the community will be to popularize and promote blockchain technology with the Cardano ecosystem in this area, training will be done and it will work along with local groups that are working or want to work on Blockchain.'' however you have not specified how you will train new people by specific means. I hope you can clarify this point a bit. The proposal will be more detailed
f6_assessments.q1: with the team's experience statement I think that with your experience on the Cardano blockchain the project has a solid basis for success. you have a full and scientific phased implementation part. study to implement this idea of the group. However, about the budget part of this proposal, I suggest to the team to split the budget into small parts, eg how much is needed to operate the website? how much for social networks, how much does the design need?. Hopefully next time you will do a more detailed budget section.
f6_assessments.q2: the proponent gave a complete and detailed roadmap, clearly stated the expected timelines for implementation through the 4 phases. However, this proposal needs to be more detailed about the budget, I think you add a few KPIs and ways to monitor the project for the community when starting to do it in real time. I recommend you to post and clarify some of the above issues for the community to assess transparency and feasibility Exam of the project is better.

f6_assessments.q0:
"This Proposal creates conferences for the majority of developers, which is an important team for the development of the Cardano system and community. In addition, the community development in Argentina also helps Cardano expand to places where Cardano is needed.
However, I have a question as to why the proposal only targets the northeastern region of Argentina and not the whole of Argentina. I think the proposal will reach more people and have a bigger impact if it is directed to the whole country of Argentina"
f6_assessments.q1:
"Team's members are currently working together in a company developing on the Cardano blockchain so they have fully experience to create community about IT.

This proposal doesn't show specific goal for their key metrics like: Monthly user interaction metrics with social networks, Monthly access and interaction metrics with website or Number of users that make up the community. So i can't sure they can reach their goals or not. If the proposer give specific number of their goals that would be easy for me to see this proposal is feasibile or not.
"
f6_assessments.q2:
"I don't see how this proposer use money to achieve their goal so it can be hard to keep track do they use money effectively or not.

The proposer should make clear about conference will be held online or offline. They can record the conference to show their job is successful or not. A website or youtube channel for their conference can be a good solution."

f6_assessments.q0: There is no Cardano community in the Northeast of Argentina, the solution is to establish a community to popularize and promote Blockchain technology with Cardano. Great recommendation and for such an important topic. Proposal suggests a legitimate problem and then provides an idea of a valid solution. I am sure that this proposal if implemented, will help the development of the Cardano network.
f6_assessments.q1:
The team consists of 3 members with the experience and capacity to implement this proposal. Their information can be easily verified under LinkedIn that the article has provided. Proposing to define goals to be achieved, complete and detailed plans. It would be better if the proponent had a list of potential future risks and challenges.
Considering the above, I agree that the experience and plan presented will be successfully implemented.
f6_assessments.q2:
The 6-month roadmap is given with very specific goals. Multiple smaller milestones within each core milestone will indicate more confidence in the expected delivery to be successful. The requested budget is quite low, only $ 4000, specifically listing the costs to be used, showing the honesty of the proposer.
I think the metrics they provide are enough to measure success and deliver solid results.

solution: Fundação de uma comunidade para a divulgação e promoção da tecnologia de cadeias de bloqueio com Cardano na região nordeste da Argentina.
experience: Atualmente, estamos trabalhando juntos em uma empresa que se desenvolve na cadeia de blocos de Cardano.
